comment:
>>37759361

> [[ Ascheritte ]]: In an awful way. It's like an addiction, a drug or something.
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( When I got to the Materialization Altar in Averron, it was like... ))
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( Reuniting with a lost loved one, if that doesn't sound stupid? ))
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( Someone you never thought you'd see again. ))
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: I think this game is doing something to people.
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( I was thinking the same. There's something weird going on. ))
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( Or maybe it's how they plan on keeping people subscribed, which is only questionably ethical. ))

"I'm asking someone if they want to come with us." You suggest. "Anyone know of a safe place to camp nearby?"

"There's a cave up ahead that was quiet on my first way through." Nel says. "I'll take the lead, if that's alright."

> [[ Ayla ]]: (( You know that schtick about bypassing hardware limitations? How far do you think that goes? ))
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Look, I don't want to think about it right this second.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: My friends and I are heading down to the ruins. I got a consultation about a boss that sounds interesting.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Do you know anyone that wants to come with us?
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( Uh, I actually wanted to hit it with my guild, but I've been itching for a chance to go down myself, if that's alright? ))
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Sounds fine to me. You can handle playing out of character for a little bit, right?
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( Oh, shut up. ))
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( Where are you guys? ))
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: There's a platform a little ways below Averron where we fought that boss. We're waiting in a cave a little further than that.

"Sounds fine. She's on her way down now, I think."

> [[ Ayla ]]: (( I'll let you know if I get lost. ))

> [[ 1/2 ]]
name: BSO
